name: Battle Cards Online
description:
This game is on pre-alpha   

What will come with new updates:

+New cards, new animations, new graphics, new sound effects

+Shop system

+Tutorial

+Bug fixing (this version of game has some bugs, i know them, they will be removed)

+Quality improvement and lots of more 

If you find any bug, or any card idea please send battlecardsonline@gmail.com a mail, i will appreciate it

If you have some criticism, please comment it below

Use shift + click for looking cards informations, this game doesn't have any tutorials in this version, so i wanted to say this
